title: 🤠 Welcome to Valley View!
body: Thanks for joining the world of Valley View. Here's a little something to get you started. Don't forget to check out our Discord server for some help and community. The link is in the side panel of the game.

title: 🤠 Just another day in Valley View!
body: Don't forget to enjoy the day :)

title: 🚂 Train Shipment Complete!
body: Your settlement filled all Train orders. Great teamwork! Here's your reward.

title: 🙏 Thank You for Your Purchase!
body: Here are the items you purchased from the Store.

title: 🗓️ Season Reward!
body: For the top 3 players across the Frontier last season.

title: 🗓️ Season Reward!
body: For all players in the top Settlement last season.

title: 🗓️ Season Reward!
body: CONGRATULATIONS! You were the top player across the Frontier last season!

title: 🤠 Thanks for playing Valley View!
body: We're so glad you're spending time with us. Here are some sweets to show our appreciation.

title: 😢 Our bad!
body: We recently had some technical issues. Thanks for your patience.
